classifications.name: CA Call it Spring Base Attributes

description:
Our comfy Lexii sneaker with a B.E.D. sole is your new go-to athleisure shoe. Workout not required.

 

Introducing B.E.D. Foam, our new comfort technology. Made from recycled mattresses and cushions, our B.E.D FOAM insoles are kind to the planet and your feet.
name: Lexii

uuid-05.content: Half sizes are not available in all styles. Sizing may vary between style and type of footwear.
